title: Can't display the table
descriptionText:
Hi, 

I'm receiving the "Can't display the data because Power BI can't determine the relationship between two or more fields." error message and I do not understand why. I have searched the net for help but can't find a post that answers my question.

It may well be a straight modelling restriction but best to check.

I have two datasources (Sheet 1 and Sheet 2). Both are Excel files.

comments.text: Please find below links to the two .pbix files I've created in an attempt toconquer this error I'm receiving.

Try this https://www.dropbox.com/home?preview=Relationships.pbix

Just I removed the relationship between sheet1 and sheet1BridgingTable, sheet2 and sheet2BrdgingTable
